column5: Spent the week at the cottage and fished every day, some more others but still was great. Caught a real mix with good sized Pike, Crappies, Smallies 2lb range, a good sized Largemouth (for this lake), some meal sized Pickeral and a ton of WGSF's. Fished solo most of the time but did have a buddy show up for a couple days and snaped a couple pic's.
Nice! Glad you had a good time and saw good action. Thanks for posting that.
Dang I'm jealous. I wish I have a full week of pure fishing lol !  Thanks for sharing.
Nice bass and nice dinner! Thanks for sharing.
WTG Bill, a couple of nice looking fish
Glad to see there are fish in your lake Bill, I guess it was just me.
Rob your welcome to give it another try, just let me know...
Nice fish Bill. Congrats on a great week at the cottage.  Mike
Hey Bill good to see a report from you .That is one beefy bass  Send us some more pics more often.  WTG
I'm seeing all these "spent time at the cottage...fished all the time" posts and I'm getting jealous....LOL.  Sounded like a GREAT week...nice bass and eye pics!
RETIRED LIFE IS TREATING YOU WELL I SEE....,same old same old here
Peter buddy, right I'm to busy for work but don't worry you only have about 20 or so years to go   ...
